name: The Golden State Multiple Choice Quiz | States | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Eastern California.

	The towns in the Owens Valley include: Big Pine, Bishop, Independence and Lone Pine.

questions.text: Which mountain range does the John Muir Trail go through?
What is the name of the city where you would find the University of California Los Angeles (UCLA)?
questions.explanation:
Los Angeles.

	UCLA is in the Westwood District, however, the city itself is Los Angeles.

questions.text: Which city would you find the minor league baseball team, the 'Quakes'?
questions.explanation:
Rancho Cucamonga.

	The Quakes are an affiliate of the San Diego Padres.

questions.text: Which college did Richard Nixon attend in Southern California?
Which city was Sonny Bono once Mayor of?
Which of these cities is closest to the US-California and Mexico border?
Which city is closest to the California and Oregon border?
Other than English, what is the second most spoken language in California?
Which wild animal roams Catalina Island?
questions.explanation:
Buffalo.

	A herd of around 400 buffalo roams Catalina Island.
